name: TigerEye
headline: Modern enterprise software for sales leaders
description: As experts in machine learning and mobile enterprise, TigerEye is uniquely qualified to reimagine what smart sales software is capable of delivering to a multigenerational workforce. At our last startup, PlanGrid, we saw firsthand what using legacy software did to our team — it slowed us down. We have the necessary skills and unwavering desire to build better tools for sales leaders. TigerEye is the solution to make faster strategic decisions.

founders.name: Ralph Gootee, Founder
founders.description:
My name is Ralph.  
- I'm a second time founder, my first company exited to ADSK for $900m Net.
- My background is abstract mathematics
- I have 3 young children
- My free time is spent reading and drawing

## TigerEye is an AI Analyst for everyone in go-to-market.
## We track the changes in your business to deliver instant, accurate answers to complex questions through a simple app.
## Make faster, smarter decisions with TigerEye. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653addd11146228383e8c898/671beb8469758123569137e0_converse%20\(1\).svg)
## Conversational Business Intelligence
TigerChat is an always-on conversational analyst that knows Go-to-market and learns your business. Answers any question about pipeline, accounts, revenue and more. TigerEye is your dedicated Ops Analyst available anytime, anywhere. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653addd11146228383e8c898/6573b8e301dfe94f0e0f932b_Check%20Circle.svg)
AI Analyst for everyone in GTM
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653addd11146228383e8c898/6573b8e301dfe94f0e0f932b_Check%20Circle.svg)
Fast, accurate answers
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653addd11146228383e8c898/6573b8e301dfe94f0e0f932b_Check%20Circle.svg)
Deep sales and marketing expertise
## Dead Simple Insights
Reporting is as simple as asking a question. TigerEye handles the rest. TigerEye shows you the results in seconds, not weeks. Continue to refine the question without learning a complex tool. When you get the answer, it’s a snap to share it, bookmark it or continue to explore. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653addd11146228383e8c898/6573b8e301dfe94f0e0f932b_Check%20Circle.svg)
Prompt-based report builder
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653addd11146228383e8c898/6573b8e301dfe94f0e0f932b_Check%20Circle.svg)
Private and shared reports and dashboards
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653addd11146228383e8c898/6573b8e301dfe94f0e0f932b_Check%20Circle.svg)
Simple roles and and data access controls
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653addd11146228383e8c898/671bee75a529960dfb801f49_insights.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653addd11146228383e8c898/671bee7624cb2a0f6d678dd8_growth.svg)
## Predict Growth
TigerEye learns your business with every change in CRM, ERP and Marketing Automation. Insights are leveraged to predict sales performance and plan growth. Explore the impact of strategic and tactical changes for the next quarter or year. Explore what’s possible and commit to the plan that sets you up for growth.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653addd11146228383e8c898/6573b8e301dfe94f0e0f932b_Check%20Circle.svg)
AI plan attainment prediction
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653addd11146228383e8c898/6573b8e301dfe94f0e0f932b_Check%20Circle.svg)
Unlimited planning scenarios
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653addd11146228383e8c898/6573b8e301dfe94f0e0f932b_Check%20Circle.svg)
Hiring plans and quota assignment
solutions

TigerEye brings together all of Go-To-Market. Strategic planning is more collaborative. Execution is aligned. Teams are accountable.

## TigerEye is an AI Analyst for everyone in go-to-market.
## We track the changes in your business to deliver instant, accurate answers to complex questions through a simple app.
## Make faster, smarter decisions with TigerEye. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653addd11146228383e8c898/671beb8469758123569137e0_converse%20\(1\).svg)
## Conversational Business Intelligence
TigerChat is an always-on conversational analyst that knows Go-to-market and learns your business. Answers any question about pipeline, accounts, revenue and more. TigerEye is your dedicated Ops Analyst available anytime, anywhere. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653addd11146228383e8c898/6573b8e301dfe94f0e0f932b_Check%20Circle.svg)
AI Analyst for everyone in GTM
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653addd11146228383e8c898/6573b8e301dfe94f0e0f932b_Check%20Circle.svg)
Fast, accurate answers
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653addd11146228383e8c898/6573b8e301dfe94f0e0f932b_Check%20Circle.svg)
Deep sales and marketing expertise
## Dead Simple Insights
Reporting is as simple as asking a question. TigerEye handles the rest. TigerEye shows you the results in seconds, not weeks. Continue to refine the question without learning a complex tool. When you get the answer, it’s a snap to share it, bookmark it or continue to explore. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653addd11146228383e8c898/6573b8e301dfe94f0e0f932b_Check%20Circle.svg)
Prompt-based report builder
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653addd11146228383e8c898/6573b8e301dfe94f0e0f932b_Check%20Circle.svg)
Private and shared reports and dashboards
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653addd11146228383e8c898/6573b8e301dfe94f0e0f932b_Check%20Circle.svg)
Simple roles and and data access controls
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653addd11146228383e8c898/671bee75a529960dfb801f49_insights.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653addd11146228383e8c898/671bee7624cb2a0f6d678dd8_growth.svg)
## Predict Growth
TigerEye learns your business with every change in CRM, ERP and Marketing Automation. Insights are leveraged to predict sales performance and plan growth. Explore the impact of strategic and tactical changes for the next quarter or year. Explore what’s possible and commit to the plan that sets you up for growth.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653addd11146228383e8c898/6573b8e301dfe94f0e0f932b_Check%20Circle.svg)
AI plan attainment prediction
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653addd11146228383e8c898/6573b8e301dfe94f0e0f932b_Check%20Circle.svg)
Unlimited planning scenarios
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/653addd11146228383e8c898/6573b8e301dfe94f0e0f932b_Check%20Circle.svg)

TigerEye brings together all of Go-To-Market. Strategic planning is more collaborative. Execution is aligned. Teams are accountable.

generated_description:
# TigerEye: Redefining Sales Intelligence

**TigerEye** is a modern software company focused on providing innovative solutions for sales leaders. Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S22, the company is located in San Francisco and operates with a compact team of 16 employees. As technology veterans from PlanGrid, the founders witnessed the challenges posed by legacy software — slow, clunky, and frustrating. With that experience, they set out to create a better alternative that enhances speed and efficiency in decision-making.

### Mission and Solutions

TigerEye’s mission is straightforward: to build modern enterprise software that meets the needs of a multigenerational workforce in today's fast-paced sales environment. Their platform leverages expertise in machine learning and mobile enterprise solutions to deliver cutting-edge applications for sales leaders. 

The technology provides critical insights for various operational areas, including:

- **Sales**: Supercharge pipeline confidence and predict performance.
- **Operations**: Automate data processing to enhance operational efficiency.
- **Finance**: Foster smarter goal-setting and collaborative planning.
- **Leadership**: Identify growth paths and strategies.
- **Marketing**: Enable AI-driven collaboration across the funnel.

These offerings empower organizations to leverage data for better strategic decisions and growth predictions.

### Why TigerEye?

The platform operates as an AI-powered analyst for go-to-market teams, meaning its insights and reporting are just a question away. If there’s a pressing query about pipeline metrics, revenue forecasts, or operational strategies, users can get answers almost instantaneously. Forget about complicated dashboards; TigerEye allows you to ask straightforward questions and receive meaningful insights in seconds.

### Unique Features

- **Conversational Business Intelligence**: Introduced via **TigerChat**, this feature allows users to interact with the software in a natural language, making business intelligence accessible to all employees, not just data experts.
- **Predictive Growth Analysis**: With insights generated from changes across CRM, ERP, and marketing systems, TigerEye can forecast sales performance, helping organizations make more informed projections and plans.
- **User-Friendly Interface**: Designed to simplify reporting and data access, making it easy for anyone to explore analytics without needing extensive training.

### Looking Ahead

TigerEye is on a mission to redefine what sales software can do. By melding deep sales and marketing knowledge with advanced analytics, they aim to streamline operations, empower teams, and help leaders make faster, smarter decisions.

For more information, visit [TigerEye](http://tigereye.com/) and see how they can transform your sales intelligence!

--- 

In a nutshell, TigerEye isn’t just about collecting data; it’s about empowering people to use that data to make smarter, more informed decisions. They’re not afraid to challenge the status quo, and in doing so, they are setting the stage for a new era in sales efficiency.
